name: Snap, Chat & Rum

ingredients.name: Pressed sugar snap pea with fennel bulb

preparation:
Did you know that sugar snap peas belong in your cocktails? Here’s a cocktail for your arsenal. It seems like a simple Daiquiri but adds fennel bulb and pressed snap peas to take it to peak freshness. Those ingredients and a high-quality rum will make this one of the best Daiquiris you’ve ever had.

Shake and strain all ingredients into chilled coupe glass.

Garnish with fennel frond.
